members.name: Wentao Xiang
members.title: Leader
members.bio: Research focus: Physiological signal analysis, virtual reality rehabilitation technology, emotion recognition
members.introduction: Wentao Xiang,associate professor of Nanjing Medical University, was selected into the Outstanding Young Teacher Training Program of Nanjing Medical University. He has published more than 20 SCI papers in journals such as Computer Methods and Programs in Biomedicine, Computers in biology and medicine, etc. It has won more than 10 national invention patents, software copyrights, etc. He presided over the sub-tasks of the National Natural Science Youth Foundation project and the National Key R&D Program, and guided the students to win 7 awards in science and technology competitions at or above the provincial level.

members.name: Rui Feng
members.title: Ph.D
members.bio: Research focus: multimodal cognitive impairment recognition and medical image processing
members.introduction: Rui Feng received the Master of Engineering degree from Nanjing Medical University, Nanjing, China, in 2023. He is currently pursuing the Ph.D. degree in clinical medical engineering at Nanjing Medical University, Nanjing, China. He is with the Jiangsu Province Smart Wearable and Rehabilitation Device Engineering Research Center, Nanjing, China. He is currently a visiting researcher at the A*STAR Institute of High Performance Computing (A*STAR IHPC). His research interests include multimodal cognitive impairment recognition and medical image processing.

members.name: Hongbin Chen
members.title: Master
members.bio: Research focus: Cognitive impairment recognition, Affective computing
members.introduction: Hongbin Chen, a Student Member of the China Society of Image and Graphics and the Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence. He is currently pursuing the M.S. degree in Biotechnology and Engineering at the School of Biomedical Engineering and Informatics, Nanjing Medical University. He is with the Jiangsu Province Engineering Research Center for Smart Wearable and Rehabilitation Devices. His current research interests include multimodal emotion computing, computer vision in medicine and biomedical signal processing.

members.name: Shuai Shi
members.title: Master
members.introduction: Shuai Shi  is currently pursuing the M.S. degree in Biotechnology and Engineering at the School of Biomedical Engineering and Informatics, Nanjing Medical University. He is with the Jiangsu Province Engineering Research Center for Smart Wearable and Rehabilitation Devices. His current research interests include audio-visual emotion recognition, facial landmark detection, and facial robotics.

members.name: Keke Shi
members.title: Master
members.bio: Research focus: Elderly Emotion recognition,Emotional regulation
members.introduction: Keke Shi received the B.S. degree from Zhengzhou University, Zhengzhou, China, in 2023. He is currently pursuing the M.S. degree in Biomedical Engineering at Nanjing Medical University, Nanjing, China. He is affiliated with the Jiangsu Province Smart Wearable and Rehabilitation Device Engineering Research Center, Nanjing, China.

members.name: Louis Badaire
members.title: Exchange
members.bio: Research focus: Emotion recognition, Biomedical signal processing
members.introduction: Louis Badaire received his B.S. degree from the University of Rennes 1, France in 2024, and is non pursuing his M.S. degree in University of Rennes 1 under the supervising of Régine le Bouquin Jeannès. He is currently an exchange student at Nanjing Medical University, China. His research interests include emotion recognition and biomedical signal processing.
